message:
Refactors ResourceLoader class.

Changes TopologyReaderBrite, UtilizationModelPlanetLab,
SwfWordloadFileReader, GoogleMachineEventsTraceReader,
GoogleTaskEventsTraceReader, GoogleTaskUsageTraceReader
and AwsEc2Template to read files when the simulation is running
inside a jar package.

Signed-off-by: Manoel Campos <manoelcampos@gmail.com>

added: * @param reader the reader for the topology file
deleted: * @param streamReader the reader to read the topology file
